Detailed Description

Command line arguments parser.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

QtArgCmdLine::QtArgCmdLine (  )  [inline]

Construct QtArgCmdLine and initialize him with QCoreApplication::arguments().

So be carefull to initialize QCoreApplication first.

QtArgCmdLine::QtArgCmdLine ( const QStringList &  args  )  [inline, explicit]

We expect programm name as first argument.

That means that

  • args[ 0 ] should be a name of the programm.

QtArgCmdLine::QtArgCmdLine ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
) [inline]

We expect programm name as first argument.

That means that

  • argv[ 0 ] should be a name of the programm.
